Summary
- Here are three stocks to buy as recommended by Raja Venkatraman of NeoTrader for Friday, 10 January.
Nifty 50 on 9 January: Recap
On Thursday, 9 January, bearish momentum persisted, with the [market ](https://www.livemint.com/market/stock-market-news/sensex-nifty-50-fall-for-second-consecutive-session-what-is-driving-indian-stock-market-down-explained-with-5-factors-11736415205248.html)showing a clear inclination towards a negative bias. Traders are advised to consider shorting the index during any temporary recoveries.
